text: Liberals and conservatives alike expect Amy Coney Barrett, whom the Senate has confirmed to the Supreme Court, to enable the dismantling of Roe vs. Wade and perhaps the undoing of Ruth Bader Ginsburg’s legacy. How likely is it that she will? https://t.co/pq5QBs4JQk

text: “Passing up a chance to help millions of people just because it might hurt my reëlection prospects—well, that was exactly the kind of myopic, self-preserving behavior I’d vowed to reject.” Barack Obama on his fight to pass the Affordable Care Act. https://t.co/LwbNXYojFf
